item.title: Enumerating Windows Machines For Fun And Legal Profit Part 1
item.description: This should probably go without saying, but this should only be used on machines you have authorization to test. Doing this against stuff you don’t have permission to is likely illegal. I mean, I’m not a lawyer, but I’m not responsible if you do something life-altering. Don’t be stupid. Whether you’re conducting penetration testing or participating in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions, one of the most critical phases is enumeration. Think of enumeration as digital reconnaissanceâ€”you’re gathering intelligence about your target to understand its structure, services, and potential vulnerabilities before attempting any exploitation.
